title: High Ponytail
description: A high ponytail is a sleek and simple style that can be dressed up or down for any occasion.

title: Layered Cut
description: Add some dimension to your hair with a layered cut that provides movement and volume.

title: Beach Waves
description: Soft, tousled waves that give you that effortless, beachy look, perfect for any casual outing.

title: Classic Bob
description: A timeless classic, the bob is a chic and versatile haircut that can be tailored to suit any face shape.

title: Pixie Cut
description: A bold and edgy haircut, the pixie cut is perfect for those who want a low-maintenance yet stylish look.

title: French Braid
description: Elegant and sophisticated, the French braid is a great choice for formal events or everyday wear.

title: Curly Afro
description: Embrace your natural curls with a voluminous afro that is both bold and beautiful.
